mapper.select: SELECT s.id AS shop_id , s.name AS shop_name , s.address AS shop_address , s.content AS shop_content , si.img_url AS img_url , c.id AS category_id , c.name AS category_name FROM tb_shop s JOIN tb_shopdetail sd ON sd.id = s.id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_shopimg si ON si.id = s.id AND si.main_img = 'Y' JOIN tb_category c ON c.id = sd.contents WHERE COALESCE(s.req_type, '') = 'Y' ORDER BY s.id, c.view;

SELECT s.id AS shop_id , s.name AS shop_name , s.address AS shop_address , s.content AS shop_content , si.img_url AS img_url , c.id AS category_id , c.name AS category_name FROM tb_shop s JOIN tb_shopdetail sd ON sd.id = s.id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_shopimg si ON si.id = s.id AND si.main_img = 'Y' JOIN tb_category c ON c.id = sd.contents WHERE COALESCE(s.req_type, '') = 'Y' AND s.id = #{shopId} ORDER BY s.id, c.view;
